/opt/intel/composerxe-2011.2.137/bin/intel64/icpc  -fPIC -DRELEASE -DNDEBUG -O3 -fomit-frame-pointer  -shared -Wl,-soname,Arnold-Mesh.so -o Arnold-Mesh.so CMakeFiles/Arnold-Mesh.dir/Arnold-Mesh.cc.o -L/home/marcus/naiad-0.6-x86_64/server/lib -L/usr/solidangle/Arnold-3.3.12.1-linux64/bin -lNi -lai -static-intel -Wl,-rpath,/home/marcus/naiad-0.6-x86_64/server/lib:/usr/solidangle/Arnold-3.3.12.1-linux64/bin:
